div.p: Know how to log into your Clever (Google EDU) Account. Your account is setup with the following defaults.

ul.li: Password: Date of birth in the m/dd/yyyy format (including slashes)

div.address: If you have any trouble logging in, please contact your Language Arts teacher or Office Manager who can submit a support ticket.

article.class: node node-teaser node-type-post node-25100 pt-show-social-block no-event-date t1 wt1 wt0 t1565 wt1565 wt1573 wt1561 wt77 wt0 access-normal no-more pt1 has-1-nt

a.title: Distance Learning Support for Families and Students
a.span: Distance Learning Support for Families and Students

div.p: Parents: please begin checking Google Classroom daily for your child’s invitation from the teacher prior to the start of Distance Learning on Monday, April 13th.
Reminder – students MUST be logged into their SCUSD Google account to access Google Classroom.

ul.li: For login and password assistance, please email your student’s classroom teacher or support@scusd.edu
For Google Classroom assistance, please email your student’s classroom teacher

div.p: The following self-guided resources will walk families how to access and use Google Classroom, Chromebooks, Zoom and other distance learning resources. Families can also access these resources on a Google Sheet.

div.class: col-3 gap-30 icp-pod ip-above fif-no fiw-100 te-hide-body te-show-readmore-always dd block block-views_blocks region-odd even region-count-1 count-14 posts views-block channel context-template

article.class: node node-teaser node-type-post node-25202 pt-show-social-block no-event-date t2 wt2 wt0 t1565 wt1565 wt1573 wt1561 wt77 wt0 access-normal has-more pt2 has-1-nt

div.p: Essential Standards are the building blocks for advancement in each subject and grade level.

For most courses of study, these documents outline the essential standards to be taught between April 13 and the end of the school year, understanding that schools closed on March 13. This guidance is provided for most, but not all subjects.

a.title: Collaborative Tools for Students to Use with Online Learning
a.span: Collaborative Tools for Students to Use with Online Learning

p.em: We are in the process of translating all of our Distance Learning Resources for Families. Translated resources will be posted as soon as they become available.

div.class: icp-pod ip-above dd block block-views_blocks region-odd odd region-count-1 count-15 pods pods-below views-block channel context-template

article.class: node node-teaser node-type-post node-25058 pt-show-social-block no-event-date t6 wt6 wt0 t1565 wt1565 wt1573 wt1561 wt77 wt0 t1573 wt1573 wt1561 wt77 wt0 t1561 wt1561 wt77 wt0 access-normal has-more has-file pt6 has-3-nt

div.p: During our district closure, we share our community’s deep concern for student learning. We have collected some of the very best, free online learning options and we hope these will support our students to continue their learning at home.
